title: Sr. Benefits Analyst-Leaves and Accommodations
content:
We offer a hybrid work environment. Most US-based positions can also be performed remotely (any exceptions will be noted in the Minimum Qualifications below.)Our Mission: 
To actively connect people to their next great opportunity.
Who We Are: 
ZipRecruiter is a leading online employment marketplace. Powered by AI-driven smart matching technology, the company actively connects millions of all-sized businesses and job seekers through innovative mobile, web, and email services, as well as through partnerships with the best job boards on the web. ZipRecruiter has the #1 rated job search app on iOS & Android.
Summary:
The Senior Benefits Analyst, Leaves and Accommodations will assist in overseeing and administering the leave of absence, accommodations and employee benefits programs as a member of the Payroll & Benefits Team. Key areas of focus will be optimizing the leave of absence and accommodations processes, identifying areas of opportunity and implementing recommendations to improve the process. This role will collaborate across the People Team, work closely with the People Business Partner Team, and interface directly with employees to guide them through the leave and accommodation process. This role will also assist with the domestic & global health & welfare benefit programs (including annual renewal and Open Enrollment), wellness initiatives, processing life status changes and collaborating with Payroll & Accounting on items as needed. The selected candidate should possess strong verbal and written communication skills, be team-oriented, have great attention to detail, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and be self- motivated.
Key Focuses:

Revamp and own the leave of absence and accommodations program in partnership with the company’s third party leave administrator
Provide leave of absence and accommodations expertise to employees and internal stakeholders 
Partner with Payroll to process leave of absence wage payments as applicable 
Support employees, Benefits Team, and other stakeholders by assisting in the oversight and administration of the employee benefits program (domestic & global)
Partner with Accounting and Payroll as needed to provide information to assist with journal entries and other backend items
Partner with Benefits Team and US & global brokers for benefits renewal and full cycle US Open Enrollment process
Ensure the accuracy of all benefits enrollments in ADP WorkforceNow to provide vendors with correct eligibility information
Frequently draft and refine various benefit communications and collateral; ensure legally required communications are up-to-date and distributed appropriately
Document and maintain administrative procedures for assigned benefits processes
Develop and implement employee wellness initiatives as lead member of Wellness Committee

Minimum Qualifications:

5+ years experience in leave of absence and/or benefits administration
Previous knowledge of employee benefits and applicable laws
Demonstrates outstanding troubleshooting, analytical and technical ability
Excellent interpersonal (verbal and written) communication skills
Ability to thrive in a fast paced and changing environment

Preferred Qualifications:

International employee benefit experience 
Bachelor Degree
HR Certifications
Advanced proficiency in ADP WorkforceNow (or comparable HRIS/Benefits system), Google Workspace and Excel

As part of our team you’ll enjoy:

Competitive compensation
A flexible environment where work-life balance is valued

#LI-Remote
The US base salary range for this full-time position is $80,000-$100,000. Our salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location, and the range displayed on each job posting reflects the minimum and maximum target for new hire salaries for the position across all US locations. Within the range, individual pay is determined by work location, role-related knowledge and skills, depth of experience, relevant education or training, and additional role-related considerations.
Depending on the position offered, equity, bonuses, commission, or other forms of compensation may also be provided as part of a total compensation package, in addition to a full range of medical, financial, and other benefits.ZipRecruiter is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or genetics.
